text: Margaret Price (13 April 1941 â€“ 28 January 2011) was a Welsh opera singer. She was famous for singing parts from Mozart operas. She sang in the opera Aida. She also sang in other operas. Price was born in Blackwood, Wales. She died from heart failure at age 69. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Welsh singers Category:British opera singers Category:1941 births Category:2011 deaths
title: Margaret Price
